content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -25.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles (positions -16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-16.5, 21.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Iron plate factory at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine at position -21.5, 25.5

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to boiler and steam engine connection
- Ensure that the boiler is properly connected to a water source and that the steam engine is connected to the boiler to avoid the "NOT_CONNECTED" status.
- Check that the boiler has fuel and that there is a liquid present in the connections to avoid operational issues.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power supply
- Make sure that all electric entities, including the lab and assembling machine, are connected to a power source to avoid "NO_POWER" status.
